active-trial-period-description-2: After this period, your subscription will be charged.
are-you-sure-you-want-to-log-out: Are you sure you want to log out?
cancel-subscription-title: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?
cancel-subscription-description: By confirming your cancellation, you will immediately lose access to all the exclusive benefits and features of your subscription.
cancel-subscription-li-1: All future charges will be stopped.
cancel-subscription-li-2: You will not be able to reactivate this subscription. If you change your mind, you will need to sign up for a new subscription.
change-credit-card-description: Future charges will be automatically made to the new card on the due dates according to your plan.
check-your-email-description-1: A verification code has been sent to
check-your-email-description-2: Check your inbox or spam folder and confirm your code.
confirm-add-participant-1: The data cannot be changed after creating the ticket.
confirm-add-participant-3: For future changes, you will need to contact support.
confirm-pay-charge: Do you want to make the updated payment of {{chargeAmount}}?
error-cancel-reason-max-length: The cancellation reason must be at most {{maxLength}} characters long
error-cancel-reason-min-length: The cancellation reason must be at least {{minLength}} characters long
error-canceling-subscription: Unable to cancel the subscription. Please check your internet connection or try again later.
error-card-number-invalid: Please enter a valid card number
error-city-max-length: The city must be at most {{maxLength}} characters
error-city-min-length: The city must be at least {{minLength}} characters
error-description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
error-expiration-date-invalid: Please enter a valid expiration date
error-holder-name-with-special-chars: Holder name should not contain special characters
error-email-invalid: Please enter a valid email address
error-email-max-length: The email address must be at most {{maxLength}} characters
error-email-min-length: The email address must be at least {{minLength}} characters
error-loading-data: Unable to load data. Please check your internet connection or try again later.
error-logging-out: An unexpected error occurred while closing your session. Please check your internet connection or try again later.
error-name-max-length: The name must be at most {{maxLength}} characters
error-name-min-length: The name must be at least {{minLength}} characters
error-page-desc-1: The data could not be loaded correctly.
error-page-desc-3: Reload the page to ensure you're using the most up-to-date version of the system.
error-page-desc-4: If the problem persists, please contact us:
error-paying-charge: Unable to pay the charge. Please check your internet connection or try again later.
error-phone-number-max-length: The phone number must be at most {{maxLength}} characters
error-phone-number-min-length: The phone number must be at least {{minLength}} characters
error-resending-ticket-email: Unable to resend the ticket email. Please check your internet connection or try again later.
error-saving-ticket: Unable to save the ticket. Please check your internet connection or try again later.
error-street-max-length: The street must be at most {{maxLength}} characters
error-street-min-length: The street must be at least {{minLength}} characters
error-updating-credit-card: Unable to update card data. Please check your internet connection or try again later.
feedback-cancel-subscription: What motivated you to cancel your subscription?
login-description: Confirm your email to access the assistant area
name: Name
no-payments-registered-yet: No payments have been recorded yet.
no-subscriptions-registered-yet: No subscriptions have been recorded yet.
no-tickets-registered-yet: No tickets have been recorded yet.
not-found-page-desc-1: The page you are trying to access does not exist or has been removed.
not-found-page-desc-2: Please check if the address is correct.
payment-confirmed-description-2: Fill in the details for each ticket to guarantee access to the event.
payment-confirmed-description-3: Fill in the details for the ticket to guarantee access to the event.
session-expired-please-login-again: Your session has expired. Please confirm your email again to continue.
something-went-wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
successfully-sending-ticket-email: Ticket sent successfully to the participant email!
successfully-added-participant-2: He will soon receive the ticket at the registered email address
support-and-contact-description: If you need help, have any questions, or want to discuss your subscription, our support team is here to help. You can contact us through the channels below:
